https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/unD2TpumTdH002EBMA4foFf01c4.jpg Described by the director as his statement on modern pornography, the film follows the misadventures of a small yellow bird, which include the adult themes of hallucinogenic drugs and sexual intercourse with a horse. Chirpy
